name: Harry Dies
description:
Harry Dies

The dragon has been enslaved by the evil princess. We must defeat the princess and save him!

Alas, the dragon will never be saved as only Chapter 1 was ever made and I most likely will never get to do the laters. But... fear not! You can test your patience with torture platformers with the first chapter. Maybe you will even finish with a score above -100, who knows!

Controls: wasd or cursor keys + space [or] a gamepad your browser recognizes

Pain awaits!

(Also, if you truly will beat this game with mobile touch controls, you are insane)
